description: This Dart source file defines the `NotesProvider` class, which acts as a state management provider coordinating between the notes database and the UI components. It provides reactive state (list of notes and loading status) and CRUD operations (create, read, update, delete) for notes.

classes.name: NotesProvider
classes.description: A ChangeNotifier-based class managing the state of notes, interfacing with a database layer, and notifying UI components of changes.

methods.name: NotesProvider
methods.description: Constructor initializing the provider with an optional database instance or default singleton.

methods.name: notes
methods.description: Getter for the list of all current notes.

methods.name: isLoading
methods.description: Getter indicating whether notes are currently being loaded from the database.

methods.name: _setLoading
methods.description: Internal method to update loading state and notify listeners.

methods.name: loadNotes
methods.description: Asynchronously loads all notes from the database and updates the internal list.

methods.name: getNoteById
methods.description: Retrieves a single note by its ID from the database without modifying the local list.

methods.name: addNote
methods.description: Creates a new note in the database and refreshes the local notes list.

methods.name: updateExisting
methods.description: Updates an existing note with new title and content, then refreshes the local list.

methods.name: deleteById
methods.description: Deletes a note by its ID from the database and updates the local list.
